issue.title: [Serialization] Support more custom datatypes in the default serialization context
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1665](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1665). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
At the moment, custom types are registered in the tests in an ad-hoc way. Instead, they should use the default serialization context introduced in ARROW-1503 to make it possible to reuse the same code in other projects.
